articles.summary: Honor announced AI Connect at MWC that allows cross-OS file-sharing between Android and iOS devices. The new feature is similar to Apple's AirDrop. articles.summary: New cars with Android Auto come with a touchscreen with a tablet-sized screen. You can open up a map of the area, connect your Spotify account, and make phone calls with ease. Android Auto is a big selling point of new cars, but there's more to it than meets the eye.

The Yale Smart Lock with Matter is designed for Google Home and is available for preorder now.

articles.summary: It's World Backup Day this coming Monday (March 31) and it's important to remember to back up all your data. The main cloud-based backup service for mobile devices is iCloud and Google Drive. Both services offer different storage tiers based on storage amounts and prices.

articles.title: The oldest car drivers can still buy new is a 60-year old 'loaf of bread'
articles.author: Jack Mortimer
articles.summary: 60 years after its launch in the Soviet Union, the UAZ 452 is the oldest car drivers can buy new. The minivan was designed to be a rugged utility vehicle for the Soviet Armed Forces, but it became popular with private drivers looking for a simple, spacious, and surprisingly affordable way to get around the countryside. The 2.7-litre petrol engine makes 112bhp and the top speed is 68mph.

articles.title: Column: Ask AI – Are You Capable of True Creativity?
articles.author: George Farris
articles.summary: George Farris is CEO of Farris Marketing. He thinks AI is good at mimicking but not capable of true creativity. AI is not a replacement for human creativity, but a tool to enhance it. AI can enhance and democratize creativity but can't create truly original or emotionally nuanced art.

articles.title: How Partnership Economies Will Shape Brand Engagements
articles.author: Soko Directory Team
articles.summary: The future of brand engagement is being redefined by the rise of partnership economies. Brands are pooling resources and aligning values to deliver innovative, purpose-driven experiences that resonate with consumers. The financial benefits of these partnerships are substantial. Companies that embrace the partnership economy have reported annual revenue growth exceeding 50%. As businesses prepare for 2025, early planning and strategic alignment will be essential.

It has a 5G connectivity, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and USB Type-C.

By blending the power of AI with heartfelt messages, Indomie is offering a new, immersive experience.

articles.title: Ashland Inc. Announces Innovation Day for Investors and Analysts
articles.author: Timothy Alexander
articles.summary: Ashland Inc. has scheduled an Innovation Day at its Bridgewater, New Jersey facility on May 29, 2025. The event will provide analysts and investors with an in-depth overview of the company's latest advancements in technology and their broad applications across key markets. The agenda includes presentations by Ashland's executive leadership and senior technology team. The program begins at 9 a.m. ET and will culminate in a question-and-answer session at around 11:30.

articles.title: Companies With $1.5 Trillion USD In Market Value Support Transition To QR Codes At Point Of Sale - Is NZ Prepared?
articles.author: Hugh Grant
articles.summary: 26 leading global companies are supporting the global transition to GS1 QR codes. They include Procter & Gamble, Mondelez, L'Oréal, Nestlé, Nestle and Alibaba. There are already pilots running in 48 countries covering 88% of the world's gross domestic product. The global ambition is for GS1 barcodes to be scannable at point of sale in retail by the end of 2027.

articles.title: ZTE nubia Neo 3 GT Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: The ZTE nubia Neo 3 GT was officially announced on March 03, 2025. The phone is fueled with a 6000 mAh battery + 80W wired + bypass charging. It is available in two colors: Electro Yellow and Interstellar Gray. It has a screen size of 6.8 inches and resolution of 1080 x 2392 pixels. It runs on Android 15 operating system with 12GB RAM and 256GB of internal storage. The main camera has a 50-megapixel (wide) and 2-megapixels (depth) sensor. On the front, the phone has an 8- megapixels camera for selfies. The lowest price is P12,999.00.

articles.title: Richard Nii Armah Quaye expands Lynx beyond music

Now, he is helping propel Lynx into an era of innovation and diversification. A key milestone in this transformation is the launch of Lynx Electronics, a technology subsidiary dedicated to pushing the boundaries of entertainment and consumer tech. articles.title: Sourdough will rise perfectly every time if you do 1 thing before baking
articles.author: Brian Dillon
articles.summary: Sourdough bread should be moistened with a generous amount of water before it goes into the oven to make sure it rises. Mary-Jane of Beautiful Living Made Easy recommends spreading the water over the surface of the dough and giving it a gentle rub to keep it flexible.

articles.title: What is vibe coding and why are people catching the trend?
articles.author: Sahana Venugopal
articles.summary: Andrej Karpathy coined the term 'vibe coding' to describe a new technology that allows people to use AI to generate code even if they don't know how to code. Vibe coding can be a fun way to generate codes for personal projects without formally leaning on the technical parts of the skill. It can also be used in conjunction with traditional coding methods to channel time and energy into the tasks that require the most intervention.

articles.title: Instacart's AI-Powered Ad Campaigns
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Instacart has unveiled a suite of AI-driven automation tools to empower brands of all sizes to achieve unprecedented ad campaign performance. The new arsenal of tools includes AI-powered landing pages, smart campaign recommendations, an enriched product library, and most notably, Universal Campaigns.

articles.title: Firms Urged to Embrace Strategic Experiential Marketing to Boost Revenue
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Abiodun Oshinibosi is the founder of Abelinis Nigeria Limited. Businesses are urged to leverage strategic experiential marketing approaches to drive revenue growth and competitiveness, according to his new book, "Abelinis: The Business of Experiential Marketing".

articles.title: Samsung's Bold Vision: 360-Degree Foldable Device Patent Emerges
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung has filed a patent application for a foldable smartphone. The device's display can fold both inward for screen protection and outward for continuous display access. Samsung's previous demonstrations of the 'Flex In & Out' concept device in 2023 reaffirms its commitment to pushing the boundaries of foldable technology.

articles.title: More From Aditya Vishwanath
articles.author: Inspirit
articles.summary: Will India continue its role as a mere service provider in the AI revolution or step forward as a global innovator in the field of artificial intelligence (AI) in the 21st century?    iReport.com: Will India continue as a service provider or become an innovator of AI?

articles.title: Philips fabric shaver that 'brings clothes back to life' is under £10
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Philips Fabric Shaver is on sale at Amazon for £9.99. It's made to revive clothes with pills, bobbles, and loose threads in one motion. The fabric shaver has 4.4 stars from 136,472 reviews. You can also buy the Steamery Pink Fabric Shavers from Oliver Bonas for £45 and the Mini Fabric Shaves from Dunelm for £5.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A16 5G launches with Super AMOLED display and support until 2030: explore the full details
articles.author: Redação Portal
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy A16 5G has a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display, a 5G connectivity, and an unprecedented six-year software update commitment. It's available in black, blue, and white and weighs 200 grams. It has a Full HD resolution of 2340 x 1080 pixels and a peak brightness of 800 nits. The camera setup is led by a 50 MP main sensor, with ultrawide and macro lenses, plus a 13 MP front camera for selfies. The side-mounted fingerprint sensor enhances usability and the inclusion of a 3.5 mm headphone jack caters to wired audio fans.

articles.title: Inside Taiwo Agboola's 10-Year Journey, Disruptive Advertising
articles.author: Life
articles.summary: Taiwo Agboola is the CEO of 7even Interactive. It's been a decade since the agency opened its doors in Nigeria. The agency has been a leader in the digital-first advertising revolution. It has been successful despite economic downturns and budget cuts.

articles.title: Full InZoi Donuts List And What They Do
articles.author: Phil Owen
articles.summary: InZoi's Ambitions system is similar to The Sims' Aspirations. You choose an ambition and complete a series of related tasks that award you NyanCoins. You can buy donuts from the Meow Coins menu on your Zoi card to boost your skill gains.

articles.title: 44 Products With Such Remarkable Results You'll Be Like "Oh, Cool, Witchcraft"
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream and Laneige's pore blurring powder are good for your skin. Pink Stuff's new "Sqeezy" sponge set helps with tough cleaning projects. Olay's Super Serum Body Wash is hydrating and moisturizing.

articles.title: The Case For and Against a Super Mario Odyssey Sequel on the Switch 2
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: There's a good chance that the Nintendo Switch 2's opening lineup will include a Mario Kart 8 Deluxe or some other game. Nintendo has yet to announce the launch date of the Switch 2 or its launch lineup. It is expected to be released in March or April.

articles.title: The only thing that can sink the Switch 2 is Nintendo's greed – Reader's Feature
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: A reader looks forward to the Nintendo Switch and shares his thoughts on it with CNN iReport.com's iReport page.  iReport: Nintendo Switch.com/news/features/nostrovia-switching-video-game-on-demand.

articles.title: World's largest EV maker shows ultra stability with Kung Fu test on 1,300 hp car's roof
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: BYD's premium Yangwang brand is expanding its lineup with the launch of the high-performance U7 sedan. The U7 is Yangwang's third model after the water-floating U8 SUV and dancing U9 supercar. The sedan will be a four-door, five-seater nearly.

articles.title: Ninja's �51 'rapid boil' kettle that 'keeps water hot for 30 minutes' is cheapest away ...
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: "This kettle is sensational. Worth every penny and so light. The water stays at boiling point for 30 minutes after boiling. "I'm the sort of person who does five jobs at once. I didn't think I could get a better kettle but this is absolutely sensational."

articles.title: Xenoblade Chronicles X has one of the most ambitious Nintendo worlds ever – even 10 ...
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Xenoblade's futuristic spin-off is finally given a chance to shine. It was originally released for the Nintendo Wii U back in 2015. It is finally being released on the PS4 and Xbox One. It's due to be released on September 25th.

articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: LG's G4 OLED TV has some of the best color and contrast I saw in 2024. This discount makes it more accessible for LG's customers who want the ultimate in visual fidelity and want to buy the TV.    for a lot more affordable.

articles.summary: Mobapad N1 HD is a more advanced gamepad for the Switch. It's more advanced than the previous version. Does it live up to its promises? We rate it out of 10.   Â. Â   y

articles.title: Jordan's 'Color of the Season' Seafoam: Shop the Collection here
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Is seafoam the new black? Jordan seems to think so, as he labels it.    "Seafoam" is a color that is either black or blackish. It's not clear which one is the new one. It could be both.

articles.title: Bengaluru-based coffee brand creates new infusion tech to make mushroom coffee
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: There are many brands that sell instant and powdered mushrooms coffees, but these are sold as whole beans that can be used to make coffee the way you like it. Other brands in the market offer instant or powdered coffees but not whole beans as such.

articles.author: Newsweek
articles.summary: There's a sandwich in Netflix's new series "Adolescence" that is making people talk about.      Â   in this case, it's the sandwich from the series. It's the main character's sandwich in the show.
